name: Minecraft Śródziemie
description: A website for my Minecraft server. It generates dynamic pages based on markdown, is written in Next.JS / React.

name: Blog App
description: A template website for a blog. It displays static pages from a CMS dynamically. It also has support for dark mode.

name: Dish Form
description: A dynamic form that used to send a POST request to an external API.

name: Maps API
description: It consumes the HERE Maps API to show you a path between two points on a leaflet map, calculate the distance, trip cost based on your prices and let you export that as PDF.
